articles.title: Real Madrid's Ramos to have knee surgery, will miss Champions League clashes - sources - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Real Madrid defender Sergio Ramos will undergo knee surgery this weekend, sources have confirmed to ESPN, and is expected to be out for six weeks.
articles.content:
Real Madrid defender Sergio Ramos is expected to be out for around six weeks, sources have confirmed to ESPN, after undergoing knee surgery this weekend.

articles.title: BACK-TO-BACK: Sydney Sixers go from ‘monumental’ error to champs in final chaos - Fox Sports
articles.description: The Sydney Sixers are back-to-back BBL champions, downing rivals the Perth Scorchers in a drama-filled blockbuster at the SCG on Saturday night.
